alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:07AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suffolk County through 145 AM EDT... At 107 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stony Brook, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stony Brook, Port Jefferson, Wading River, Rocky Point, Mount Sinai, Calverton, Setauket, Ridge, Miller Place, Port Jefferson Station, Sound Beach, Nissequogue, Poquott, Old Field and Belle Terre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
